Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Gigue in G major, BWV Anh. 81

? · BWV3 App C, p. 714

[IMSLP]

This gigue is incomplete and is probably spurious. The gigue includes a part for pedal, but can still be played effectively, albeit with some awkwardness, on an instrument without pedals.

Recommended editions

  • Bärenreiter · BA 5249 · J. S. Bach zugeschriebene Werke für Tasteninstrumente · ed. Frieder Rempp

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5
